back_cards.example_en: She altered her dress to fit better.

back_cards.example_en: The animal shelter cared for stray dogs.
The homeless shelter offered warm beds.

back_cards.definition_en: A hint or piece of information
back_cards.example_en: The detective found a clue at the scene.

back_cards.definition_en: A guide to solving a puzzle
back_cards.example_en: The riddle gave no clear clue.
A footprint was the only clue.

The guideline helped them plan the event.

back_cards.definition_en: A state of ease or relief
back_cards.example_en: The chair provided great comfort.

His words gave her comfort.
The cozy room was full of comfort.
Her pregnancy was announced joyfully.

back_cards.definition_en: The period of carrying a baby
back_cards.example_en: She took classes during her pregnancy.

back_cards.definition_en: A time of expecting a child
back_cards.example_en: The pregnancy lasted nine months.
She monitored her health during pregnancy.
The doctor discussed pregnancy care.

back_cards.definition_en: To take with intent to return
back_cards.example_en: She borrowed a book from the library.
He borrowed his friend’s car.

He borrowed tools from his neighbor.

back_cards.definition_en: A sign of affection or respect
